t=int(raw_input())
for _ in range(t):
    s=raw_input()
    pals=[]
    for i in range(0,len(s)):
        sub1=s[i:]
        sub2=s[:len(s)-i]
        if sub1 not in pals:
            pals.append(sub1)
        if sub1[::-1] not in pals:
            pals.append(sub1[::-1])
        if sub2 not in pals:
            pals.append(sub2)
        if sub2[::-1] not in pals:
            pals.append(sub2[::-1])
    found=False
    for el in pals:
        if el not in s:
            found=True
            break
    if found:
        print 'NO'
    else:
        print 'YES'
